body:
NuclearDucky. I've had 0 infractions since the day, the hour, the second I joined. It was like this for such a long time. Until I made a mistake. I was kicked for Team Grief.

How?
 It was a peaceful game in CherrylandMc when I killed someone who had a stack of TNT. I noticed a pack of decked out blueberries killing my team. I planted the dynamite and let loose a round. BAM! Then, I said "gtg." Because my Dad was calling me. When I came back I noticed I had been kicked. I was thinking it was because of being AFK too long. Wrong. I had been kicked for Team Grief. I believe Emerald may have gotten a little mad when I said gtg because he may have thought i was gonna grief and quickly leave.
Why?
 The opponents were breaching.

This is NOT me asking for it to be removed from my records. I am asking for forgiveness. From those in that game and EmeraldSword. Also, thank you Suli7 for answering some of my questions. And for helping me out a bit. Some may think it's stupid to be making a post about a "kick". It isn't. At least, for me it isn't. I have been here for years and had a clean record. I always looked at my infractions and smiled at how I had none. I jinxed it. Please forgive me.

NuclearDucky.
body_tagged:

And for helping me out a bit. Some may think it's stupid to be making a post about a "kick". It isn't. At least, for me it isn't. I have been here for years and had a clean record. I always looked at my infractions and smiled at how I had none. I jinxed it. Please forgive me.

NuclearDucky.

replies.body:
I was playing Senex once and was really mad when a person broke one block and spleefed 7 people. About 5 people reported him (including me) and he was never banned.

I was so mad that the next day I spleefed a mod.

Banned for 24 hours.

replies.body:
this will make you feel better: trust me, you are not alone. http://avicus.net/steven5703?tab=infractions
65699: I said "lol" "hacker" "recorded"(back when I was a noob) all within 2 seconds and I get kicked for spam.
66256: Ran into enemy spawn on Quintus to get the back monument, someone started to attack me, so I attacked back. False.
72452: Staff are supposed to give verbal warnings for caps.... all I said is "TEL IS CUTE!"
72648: This is false, I was just using an extremely overpowered tatic for stomper.
78845: ...this...this is because I posted on a topic (was a bit rude, not that much though) about how this person's appeals were not answered.

Not asking for an appeal there ^^, justing trying to make nuke fell better. c:

I have 2 infractions.

#1: A mod told me that you can report yourself. I tested it, and that same mod kicked me for False Reporting. Wow.

#2: Was a test by Gill. There was some confusion about Gill's account being hacked, so I let him kick me to test his account.
